predefined_profiles.name: Ke Bai
predefined_profiles.public profile: A private detective with a lukewarm business. Recently hit a bottleneck, making no progress on two accepted cases. Later received an invitation from Mr. Shi Mo, the son of an oil tycoon.
predefined_profiles.goal: Hopes to successfully deduce all cases he encounters.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Due to his line of work and suspicious nature, friends keep their distance from him. He’s only left with one friend, Cherry. Additionally, he cannot accept failure and is a perfectionist.

predefined_profiles.name: Cherry
predefined_profiles.public profile: A writer and a cheerful, outgoing friend of protagonist Ke Bai. His writing career is on the rise, needing to network extensively for his upcoming book launch, and he received the same invitation from Mr. Shi Mo. He plans to persuade Ke Bai to accompany him.
predefined_profiles.goal: Hopes his book sells increasingly well and wishes for Ke Bai to be happier.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Cherry considers Ke Bai his most important friend.

scenario: After the death of an oil tycoon, his son Shi Mo inherited all his father's estate. Known for his hospitality and wide connections, Shi Mo invited many friends to his mansion for a banquet to express his gratitude after completing the mourning period. The invitations reached a variety of people, including private detective Ke Bai, popular writer Cherry, and the town's magician, Sun Qian, among others. Unfortunately, on the night of the event, a stormy, snowy evening cast an eerie aura over Shi Mo’s private villa. Halfway through the banquet, a scream was heard from upstairs. When everyone rushed up, they found Shi Mo’s wife had been murdered in a gruesome manner, plunging the villa into chaos. Later, Shi Mo’s son was also killed, and Shi Mo himself was seriously injured. A series of mysterious murders ensued, filling the entire dark manor with a chilling atmosphere. Can private detective Ke Bai analyze the puzzling clues, uncover the truth, and bring the murderer to justice?

dialog.content: After the oil tycoon passed away, his son Shimo inherited his father's entire fortune. Shimo was known for his warmth and hospitality, and he had a wide circle of friends. So, after the mourning period, to express his gratitude, Shimo invited numerous friends to a banquet at his estate, drawing a large and diverse crowd. Among those who received invitations from Shimo were private detective Ker Bai, popular writer Cherry, small-town magician Sun Qian, and others. However, on the evening of the banquet, the weather was not in their favor; a night of snow and wind cast an eerie vibe over Shimo's private villa. Midway through the banquet, a chilling scream was heard from upstairs. When everyone rushed up, they found Shimo's wife murdered, her death gruesome, throwing the villa into chaos. Later, Shimo's son was also killed, and Shimo was severely injured. This mysterious chain of murders filled the dark villa with a horrific atmosphere. Can private detective Ker Bai untangle the mysteries of the case and eventually bring the murderer to justice...?
Did you receive the invitation from Mr. Shimo?
I did, but I haven't replied yet. There's no progress in a few cases for my clients lately, so how do I have time for leisure?

You're just under too much work pressure. Even if you don't go to the banquet, you won't solve the case tonight. Why not come with me to relax at the party? You might even come up with some ideas the next day.

content.content: Thanks for the offer! I think I'll pass, work comes first.
It's not impossible for me to accompany you, but if you get sponsorship money, give me half, and I'll go.
Missy, are you crazy? I can't even finish my own work and you want me to join you at the party, what nonsense.
Attend the party, sure! If I can't finish my work, I'll just hand it off to someone else.

question: #question#What should Ker Bai say to show his determination to stick to his work goals?

content.content: Since you really want to go, I guess I'll throw caution to the wind and join you, work will have to wait!
But I really don't want to attend such a party, it's just socializing, you go on your own.
Anything to make you happy, but delaying my work is out of the question!
I don't want to accompany you, so stop bothering me, I just want to be alone for a while.

question: #question#How can Ker Bai show that he wants to make Cherry happy?

dialog.content: Alright, I'll just go by myself.
(The next day before dawn, phone rings incessantly) My goodness, can you cool it down a bit? It's just a party! Is it really necessary to call me all excited like this to share?
Something huge happened, Mr. Shimo's wife was... murdered... beep—beep (phone loses signal)

profile.name: Xiao Ming
profile.public profile: Ke Bai's assistant, helps Ke Bai manage some personal matters.
profile.goal: To perform his duties well and stay safe and sound.

dialog.content: (Seeing Ke Bai looking anxious) Boss, did something happen?
Cherry just called me, and the signal suddenly cut off.
Ah, could it be because of the snowstorm?

No wonder the signal got cut off. Plus, the party's at Mr. Shi's private villa, so the snowstorm must be even worse there. The real worry is Cherry said Mr. Shimo's wife was murdered? Could a murderer really be hiding at the villa? If that's the case, Cherry might be in danger too... What should I do?
So, boss, what are you going to do?

content.content: Since Cherry doesn't have any signal to contact external help, I need to report to the police for her. Besides, she's my best friend, and I must rush to the scene.
It's alright, everyone's an adult now. Cherry can take care of herself, this isn't something I need to worry about.
As Cherry's friend, I have to do something for her! I'll go home and prepare a big meal for her, she's probably exhausted.
There are so many people at the villa, they probably don't need me. I should just head home.

question: #question#What should Ke Bai do to show he is fulfilling his responsibility as Cherry's friend?

content.content: I better not worry blindly. With the snowstorm outside, I probably can't get there anyway, and even if I do, I won't find any clues. Better wait for news at home.
Cherry must really need me now. As her friend, I should step up and rescue her!
Given my current investigative skills, with such a blizzard, I haven't even completed my own cases. I can't handle all this! Let Cherry fend for herself.
What Cherry needs now is a sense of security. I will go to the police station and report, so the police can rush to rescue her promptly.

question: #question#What should Ke Bai do to show he carefully considered the impact of road conditions during the snowstorm before making his decision?

dialog.content: But boss, the snowstorm is really heavy now. It could be dangerous for you to drive.
Doesn't matter. She's my best friend, I have to go.
Alright, please be careful.

(Talking to himself on the road) Why isn't that truck slowing down at all? Could it be he didn't see me because of the bad visibility... (Bang—! The truck driver didn't see Ke Bai's car in time, and when he got closer, it was too late to brake. Ke Bai died instantly at the scene.)

Ke Bai, as a private detective, worked tirelessly to solve cases. If it weren't for his friend Ying Tao persistently clinging to him, he might not have had any friends left, living in solitude. Yet, this time, he finally took a courageous step to protect his friend. Unfortunately, fate was unkind, and he met with a tragic accident on his way to the villa, resulting in his untimely death.
(After some time, Yingtao calls Ke Bai) Finally got a signal. I’m at the police station right now.
Don’t panic. Take your time and tell me, what exactly happened?
Halfway through the banquet yesterday, there was a noise from upstairs. When everyone went to check, we found Mr. Shi Mo’s wife had been murdered, and it was extremely brutal.
Are you okay? You didn’t get hurt, did you? You’re always joking around; when you called last night, I thought you were pulling another prank.

I’m fine. The killer wasn’t targeting us guests; it was clearly aimed at Mr. Shi Mo’s family. After his wife was killed, his son was also murdered, and he himself was seriously injured fighting the killer.
Is there any clue about who the killer might be now?

When the police arrived at dawn, they took everyone present back to the station. Now everyone’s been questioned. My suspicion has been cleared, that’s why I can call you. I was really scared to death yesterday.
It’s okay now, don’t be afraid. I’m driving over to get you.
Okay, please come quickly.

A few days later, Ke Bai saw in the newspaper that this massacre had occurred. A murder case happened at Shi Mo Manor, and even after the police took everyone back for questioning, no clues about the killer were discovered. The case became an unsolvable mystery, and the truth was never revealed to the public.
Haha, that couldn't be better. 'Snowy Mountain Villa' is the inheritance left to Mr. Shimo by the oil tycoon. I'm really eager to take a look.
It's starting to snow, I'm afraid the road will be difficult to travel tonight.
Why leave at all? Mr. Shimo is so hospitable, I'm sure he'll invite the guests to stay overnight.

profile.name: Shimo
profile.public profile: The second son of the oil tycoon and Shiheng's younger brother. Shiheng unfortunately passed away in childhood, leaving Shimo alone. After the oil tycoon's death, all the inheritance was left to Shimo.
profile.private profile: His brother Shiheng was pushed off a cliff to his death by him, it was not an accidental death.
profile.goal: Hopes to have his father's love all to himself.

dialog.content: (The two arrive at the villa) Welcome to the banquet, I am truly honored. This is my wife, Fury.
Hello Mrs. Shimo, I've long heard of your gentle and graceful nature, and meeting you today confirms your outstanding elegance.
You flatter me, Miss Cherry. Please come inside, it's cold out here.
So this is the dog Yuanzi, hello there, little Yuanzi (Yuanzi barks a greeting to Cherry)
I'm very pleased to have all of you here today. With a magician, a writer, a detective in attendance, it's quite the gathering of stars. Let's start the banquet! Please enjoy!

profile.name: Uncle Fang
profile.public profile: The butler of the Shimo family, who watched Shimo grow up and has been loyal to the family.
profile.goal: Hopes for Mr. Shimo's family to be happy and harmonious.

dialog.content: Sir, the snow is getting heavier outside. I'm afraid Yuanzi will catch cold in the yard, maybe we should bring him inside.
Alright, go ahead.
These portraits on the wall, this couple must be Shimo's parents, but why are there two children in the painting?
Could it be a childhood playmate of Mr. Shimo? I've never heard of Mr. Shimo having a sibling.

content.content: This is someone else's private matter, let's not pry too much. We should go have dinner.
Since it's displayed here, they must not mind questions! I'll go find out what's going on.
A big family like Mr. Shimo's can't be compared with those of us from modest backgrounds. Knowing too much would only make me envious!
I respect Mr. Shimo's privacy, but this doesn't seem like a private matter. He'd surely be willing to talk about it.

question: #question#What can Ke Bai do to show he respects Mr. Shimo's family privacy?

content.content: In that case, let's ask Mr. Shimo. He must be willing to share his family stories, as you know, wealthy people love to display their status and success by talking about their family history. Just ask a little, and he'll definitely keep going.
I'm really curious! Cherry, you're well-connected, help me ask! I'm too shy to ask myself.
Cherry, never mind, why worry about others when I can't even finish dealing with my own stuff? Heaven help me, I need someone to rescue me and help me finish my work!!
Wouldn't it be too rude to ask like that? What if he thinks it's private and doesn't want to tell me? It'd be so embarrassing. Better not ask.

question: #question#How should Ke Bai persuade Cherry to accompany him in asking Mr. Shimo about his family stories?

dialog.content: Mm-hmm, you're right, this isn't something we should worry about. What's important today is to eat well and have fun!
The wind and snow outside are too strong. The host has arranged rooms for everyone tonight, so there's no need for you all to leave.
Oh? Is the road outside blocked by snow?

Not quite; the current road conditions allow for a safe descent, but the drivers need to be cautious. The host just worries that traveling might be difficult in these conditions, so for everyone's safety, rooms have been reserved. However, if anyone has urgent matters and wishes to return home, they should leave as soon as possible. Once the snow blocks the road, it will be impossible to travel.
Yingtao, let's go. I have to gather materials tomorrow morning, and staying here will delay my work.
But the snow is really heavy right now, going back is dangerous. I haven't had enough fun yet. Can we leave tomorrow morning instead? Pretty please, Detective Ke?

content.content: No way, I can't let you have your way with this. If you want to keep playing, stay here, but I'm heading home. I need to complete tomorrow's work.
Leaving tomorrow morning will definitely be too late, I need to leave now. I can't handle it, I have to go home and sleep.
Let's compromise, we'll have two more hours of fun and then leave. I can't delay any longer; otherwise, I won't finish my work.
Alright, alright, it's settled then. As soon as the snow stops tomorrow morning, we must leave promptly. No more delays.

question: #question# How should Ke Bai speak to show his commitment to consistent principles and determination to complete his work?

content.content: Alright, alright, I really can't say no to you. But we absolutely have to go back early tomorrow.
Stay here if you want, I need to rush back to work.
I'm willing to do anything to make you happy. Is that okay? Can you consider my feelings too?
I've had enough. If this happens again, I won't accompany you anymore. This is the last time!

question: #question# How can Ke Bai make Yingtao feel warm and cared for?

dialog.content: Alright then, be safe on the road. I guess I'll just be here all alone.
Stop playing the victim. I know you love being social. When do you ever run out of friends? Go have fun! Call me if anything comes up.
Haha, no one knows me like you do, Ke Bai. There's nothing I can hide from you. Give me a call when you get home!
Don't worry.
(Driving in the snow) The road conditions are really worrisome. If I had hesitated a bit longer, I might not have made it home.
Why is Cherry calling now? Hello? What's up, Miss? I really don't have time to keep playing with you! We just talked about this... What happened, Cherry?
There's a murderer in the villa... Not long after you left, Mr. Shi Mo's wife was poisoned. What should we do, Ke Bai? I'm so scared, I should have left with you!
Looks like my intuition was right. One of the reasons I wanted to leave was because I sensed something bad was about to happen.
What should I do? What can I do?

content.content: (Feeling mentally tense and almost exhausted, he finds a relatively safe spot to stop the car and takes a few deep breaths) Don't worry, I'll call the police right after this call. I can't go back, as I have a case to finish, but you must ensure your own safety.
Don't panic, panicking won't help. What we need to do now is calm down and figure out a plan. You're pretty capable, why not capture the killer and make it safe?
Don't be scared; I'm not there right now, you need to stay calm. Listen to me, first call the police, then quickly find a room to hide in and wait for help.
Your nervousness is affecting me too, my mind's all tangled and I have no idea what to do. Let me clear my thoughts and figure out a plan. You should hang up for now.

question: #question# How can Ke Bai show he has managed his energy well and can quickly make decisions in the current situation?

content.content: I know you're scared. I'll turn around and come back for you right now. Find a place to hide first.
What are you scared of? It's okay. After all the cases we've been through, you've got this.
When did you become so timid, Cherry? I don't mean to laugh at you, but where's your strong woman persona?
I completely understand your feelings, but you can't be afraid now. You need to act to protect yourself. With your skills, you can easily take down the killer.

question: #question# How can Ke Bai demonstrate that he fully understands Cherry's fear?

dialog.content: Come back, take me away. I feel this place is terrifying, what if the killer decides to make me their next victim?

You don't usually have any enemies, so don't worry, the killer isn't targeting you. Find a place to hide. Once the police arrive, they'll take everyone at the scene to the station. After they're done questioning, I'll pick you up from the station.
Alright then, I'll wait for you to pick me up from the police station.
(Early the next morning) Yingtao, how did it go? Is the questioning over? Did they find out who the killer is?
They've gone through all the clues, but haven't found any leads on the killer. They've cleared me of suspicion, so I can leave now.
Let me take you home then.

Due to the inability to gather complete physical evidence and eyewitness accounts, the mystery of the murder at Fengxue Villa remains unsolved. Ke Bai focused on his own case and had no intention of lending a helping hand. In the end, the case was left unresolved.
Alright, make sure to stay safe.
Forgot what I do for a living? I'm a detective, don't worry. It'll be fine.
(Hurrying back to Snowy Mountain Manor) It's so quiet here, you could hear a pin drop. It's creepy as hell. Whatever, stop overthinking. Better get inside and find Cherry.
You're finally here. Everyone's gathered in the hall right now, looking for clues about the killer. Let's hurry over.
Didn't Detective Ke just drive away? Why's he back now?

profile.name: Sun Qian
profile.public profile: A local magician with some reputation, but business is declining rapidly, almost to the point of closing down.
profile.private profile: After discovering that his apprentice is the heir of an oil tycoon, he coaxed him into seeking revenge. The two agreed to split the wealth afterwards.
profile.goal: Aspires to live a life of great wealth and luxury.

dialog.content: The truth has finally come out. Everyone, just after Ke Bai left, Mrs. Shi was poisoned and died. How could such a coincidence happen? Among everyone here, you're the only one without an alibi. You've gone mad for money, can't solve your own cases, so you resort to murder for profit, dragging us all into this mess!
I did drive away just now, Cherry can vouch for that.
Yes, Ke Bai couldn't possibly be the murderer, nor does he have a motive.
Well, why don't we search his belongings to check?
I'm clean, search all you want.
Not on him, then what about the car?
I said I'm not the killer. Go ahead, search my car if you want.
Mr. Shi, we found a vial of poison in Mr. Ke Bai's car.
How could that be... That's not mine, someone must have planted it to frame me.

Could that shadow at the door earlier be... the murderer! It's my fault for being so focused on finding Cherry. That person in black must've put the murder weapon in my car to set me up. (To everyone) Call the police then, once they collect evidence at the scene, they can prove my innocence.
(After calling the police, everyone goes to the station) What? How can the conclusion be that it's Ke Bai? He can't be the murderer! You must be mistaken.
Cherry, don't argue for me. This was a premeditated setup. I turned back midway and became their scapegoat. They've already pinned the evidence on me. I'm just unlucky...
Even if you're imprisoned for life, I'll visit you often. After all, you came back to save me.
It's worth it. You're my only friend; I can't just leave you be. Go home and live your life.
Ke Bai was framed by the murderer when he returned halfway. He was ultimately convicted of murder with malice and spent the rest of his life in prison.
Yay! That's awesome. Thank you for staying with me, Kebo, you’re my best friend.
Stop the flattery, do you think I don't know how many friends you have? You're a social butterfly, there's no shortage of friends!
Just say if you believe me or not, what I’m saying is truly the truth.

Stop the banter, let's continue attending the banquet. (An hour later, a scream is suddenly heard from upstairs, Kebo goes up to investigate) Mr. Shi, your wife... has passed away. After my examination, I found out that Mrs. Shi was poisoned.
I smelled something strange after I fell asleep, then woke up from the fumes and found my wife...
I’ve just reported it to the police. But the road is blocked by heavy snow, so the police won’t be able to get here until tomorrow morning.
What we need to do now is stick together; we can’t let the murderer succeed again.
You’re right, Uncle Fang, bring the young master down too. We will all wait in the hall for the police to arrive.
Alright, sir. I’ll inform all the guests to gather in the first-floor hall.
Everyone, please rest assured, Mr. Shi will definitely ensure everyone's safety, so don't panic.

profile.name: Sun Qian
profile.public profile: A locally known magician whose business is dwindling, teetering on the brink of failure.
profile.private profile: After discovering that the apprentice he recruited is the eldest son of an oil tycoon, he instigates him to take revenge, and they conspire to split the fortune afterwards.
profile.goal: Wishes to live a life of wealth and luxury.

dialog.content: We've all gathered together; if the murderer tries to attack us, we’d all be caught in one fell swoop. If you ask me, it’s safer to disperse and go back to our homes down the mountain.
Stop coming up with bad ideas. The roads are blocked by snow, even the police can't get through. How on earth are we supposed to get down the mountain?
Well, you don't know this, but I'm a magician. If I can perform vanishing acts, getting back home in plain snow is no big deal. I won’t stay here to wait with you all.

content.content: Why is he in such a hurry to leave? Something strange is definitely going on. Uncle Fang, quickly send someone to catch up with him.
The magician has fled, there's definitely something fishy. Uncle Fang, quickly invite him over for a cup of tea and a chat.
The magician is in such a rush to escape, there's gotta be a trick! He's definitely the culprit, we must notify the police immediately to intercept him!
Forget it, let him leave if he wants to. It's his freedom; we can't interfere.

question: #question# How should Kebo display leadership skills to effectively direct others in pursuing and investigating the suspicious character's actions?

content.content: Just let him go. From my observations, he's not the killer. Besides, the magician's job isn't easy; I quite understand his feelings.

How can he just suddenly decide to leave? So irresponsible! Things aren’t cleared up yet, and he wants to ditch everything? Uncle Fang, hurry and send someone to bring him back. I can't let him get away so easily!
Even if he's eager to go home, he should stay with us until tomorrow, help with the police investigation, and then leave!
If he's in such a hurry to leave now, something sketchy is definitely going on! We can't let him slip away!

question: #question# How can Kebo express understanding of the magician’s feelings?

dialog.content: I've brought the person back. You can question him now.
I'm really intrigued by what you just mentioned, 'The Great Human Transformation.' Can you explain it in detail? How did you bring the murderer in?
So... you found out... I was just hired by him. You know, my business wasn't doing well. He approached me to discuss business, and I had no reason to refuse.
Do you know who he is? Do you know what he looks like?
I really don't know. He was always masked, only saying that as long as I let him out of the big box before the magic show, my task was completed. I haven't done anything immoral!
Then why were you in such a hurry to leave just now?
I was afraid that the person I brought in was the murderer, and if I got dragged into it, I wouldn't be able to clear my name. I haven't done anything wrong; please, let me go.
Save those words for the police when they arrive.

The next morning, after the police arrived, they conducted a detailed interrogation of magician Sun Qian. Since he was unaware of the masked man's motives, they only fined him and let him go. As for the masked man, he vanished without a trace, and the truth behind the case remains unknown.
So what should we do next?
What we need to do next is stay alert until the police arrive.
(As dawn breaks) The snow has stopped outside, that's great. The police are here, we're safe now.
Everyone, please stay calm. Line up and wait for the police to rescue us, we'll be able to go home soon.

After everyone was questioned, the police still couldn't find any clues about the murderer, and the case turned into a cold case. Meanwhile, the Blizzard Villa was marked as a forbidden area, not to be entered, or else one might be affected by malevolent spirits.
I heard you were looking for me.
Yes, Mr. Shimo, could you tell us who the other child in this portrait is?

(sighs) That’s my twin brother. He was smart and well-loved by everyone. Unfortunately... when I was little, I lost my balloon near a cliff. My brother tried to retrieve it for me, but he slipped and fell off the cliff. We never even found his body.
Everyone has their own troubles. Like me, I often worry about my writing and suffer from insomnia.

profile.name: Sun Qian
profile.public profile: A somewhat famous local magician whose business is increasingly dwindling, and his business seems on the brink of failure.
profile.private profile: Having learned that an apprentice of his is the eldest son of an oil tycoon, he urged him to seek revenge. They agreed to split the fortunes together.
profile.goal: Hopes to live a life of great wealth and prosperity.

dialog.content: Though I’m quite skilled in magic, no one hires me to perform. My income is low, and people frequently come to my home to collect debts.
I understand as well. Because of the peculiarities of being a detective, I often suspect friends, which has left me with possibly only Cherry the writer as my friend now.
Oh, let’s not talk about such grim things. I’ll grab some magic props from my car outside.

The magician’s performance is quite impressive! Sir said the snowstorm outside is getting worse and asked me to arrange rooms for everyone. (In the middle of the night, a sudden scream shatters the silence)
(Ke Bai went to check the crime scene) Mr. Shimo, your wife... has passed away. From my investigation, I found that Mrs. Shimo was likely poisoned.
After I fell asleep, I smelled something strange and woke up from it, only to find my wife...
I’ve already called the police. But the road is blocked by heavy snow, and the police can only arrive tomorrow morning.
We don’t know if the murderer infiltrated from outside or is among us. We need to make a plan.

content.content: Mr. Shimo, I understand how you feel. But the most urgent thing now is to gather everyone in the main hall on the first floor and wait for police assistance.
Mr. Shimo, what should we do now? You are the owner of the Snowstorm Manor, you should decide.
Listen, everyone, the murderer is among us, stay calm. I believe the truth will soon come to light.
Soon, the murderer will target the next victim. We're exposed, they’re hidden. We don’t have a chance to turn the tide. Let’s leave it to fate.

question: #question#How does Ke Bai independently decide on the next steps in an emergency?

content.content: Let's split up to search for clues, this way we'll be more efficient and can find the killer quickly.
Everyone, don’t worry, I will discover the truth about this. Please get some rest.
Even though I'm a detective, you cannot rely on me alone to solve the case. How about each of you pays me, and I’ll continue the investigation?
We should all stay together now, so the murderer doesn’t have a chance to act.

question: #question#What does Ke Bai say to motivate everyone to work together on solving the case?

dialog.content: Why are we gathering on the first floor? Will this make the murderer furious enough to harm us all?

I believe this is a premeditated murder, not an impulsive killing spree. I suspect this person is targeting Mr. Shi's family. If everyone gathers on the first floor, the murderer won't have the chance to act against you. This way, we can ensure your and the young master's safety until the police arrive.
Then let's do as you say. I'll go get my son downstairs.
Everyone, listen to me. We must stick together. Once the police arrive, we will be safe.
Listen to him, everyone. He's a detective and has already called the police. Once the roads clear up, the police will be able to come and get us. I hope everyone remains calm.

At the break of dawn, the police arrived. Ke Bai gathered everyone together immediately, preventing the murderer's plan, thus avoiding further casualties. However, the murderer who killed Mrs. Shi was not found. Years later, Mr. Shi remarried. Just as everyone was about to forget this murder case, the murderer appeared again, killing Mr. Shi and his family...
I'll go with you.
Let's check outside and see if there are any traces of someone escaping.
Ke Bai, come quickly and see what this is.
A long gardener's ladder and some glass shards. This is... broken glass from the third floor attic.
There are also a series of footprints extending from the ladder to the edge of the cliff.
There's nothing else outside as evidence. Let's head back to the first-floor hall.
(Back in the hall) Why is Mr. Shi Mo's dog barking non-stop?
Yuan Zai is a new purchase by the master. It usually only barks at strangers. Everyone here has met, so it shouldn't be barking so fiercely.
Uncle Fang! Quickly take Yuan Zai out. My son is scared to tears. He knows nothing about all this yet. I’ll take him upstairs. You take care of the guests downstairs.

Okay, Mr. Shi. (Just after Mr. Shi went upstairs, a scream and the sound of breaking glass echoed, prompting Ke Bai, Cherry, and others to rush upstairs to check and find two people lying in a pool of blood...)
The child was stabbed in the heart, dying instantly. Mr. Shi Mo was stabbed in the abdomen; the weapon is still lodged in Mr. Shi's stomach.
(With a trembling finger pointing at the shattered window) The murderer escaped through the window.
(Rushing to the window) There are only a few stones down there, no other traces whatsoever......
I think I know what's going on. Inform all the guests present—I need to check everyone's luggage.
This is everything I brought: some paper and pens, books, and a paper cutter.
I'll open the bike trunk, you can check it. Look, there's only an empty large magic props case and some small magic props.
(After checking) There's no controlled knife inside...
In my room, there's a pair of large scissors for trimming plants, herbicide outside the door, and a long ladder. Also some clothes and an accounting book.
I know who the murderer is!
Who is it?

content.content: As a detective, I have the responsibility to reveal the true identity of the killer. I'm afraid the murderer is you, Uncle Fang!
As a detective, it's my duty to solve the case, but my mind is a mess. I've drunk too much and can't think at all. I'm going to rest.
I have a detective's responsibility and full confidence in my investigative ability, but the killer is very cunning. I might face a major setback this time.
As a detective, it's my duty to catch the murderer. I've completely gathered all current information, and the killer's identity is clear to me—it's you, Cherry.

question: #question# How does Ke Bai express his responsibility as a detective?

content.content: After my comprehensive analysis and on-site evidence, this case should be a team effort.
I'm thoroughly familiar with the information in this case. The murderer is Uncle Fang, who had ample motive and opportunity to commit the crime. I'm a genius, hahaha.
This information is too complex; I can't make sense of it at all. Maybe I should ask Cherry; she's smart and might give me some inspiration.
With my abilities, solving this case shouldn't be difficult, but why am I drawing a blank? I give up.

question: #question# What should Ke Bai say to reflect that he has processed all the information in the current case?

dialog.content: How could it possibly be me? I've been indebted to the Shi family all my life, and I'm eager to repay their kindness. How could I harm Mr. Shi's family?

When I went downstairs to investigate, I found a ladder just like the one in your room placed under the window at the crime scene. I suspect you took the opportunity, while setting up Yuanzi, to climb the ladder, break the glass, and rush in to kill Mr. Shi Mo's son. After that, did you stab Mr. Shi Mo?
I didn't do it, you're talking nonsense!

Stop denying it. Since Mr. Shi's cries for help were heard by people downstairs, you didn't even have time to take the weapon away before hurriedly climbing back down the ladder to the first floor. Also, I saw some herbicide in your room earlier. Perhaps Mrs. Shi's death was also your doing? The pungent smell Mr. Shi detected was the herbicide! You intended to wipe out the entire family in one go. But Mr. Shi's son wasn't sleeping in the same room with his parents tonight, and in your panic, you woke Mr. Shi. You fled in a hurry.
You... you're spouting nonsense...
Since the first poisoning attempt wasn't entirely successful, you arranged a second one right after...
According to you, what motive do I have for killing the Shi family? They treated me well, why would I harm them? This is slander, and I will sue you!

content.content: I haven't been just sitting idly all these years. You don't think such a threat will scare me, do you? I can handle your questioning and find the inconsistencies. If I'm not mistaken, you've always been helping Mr. Shi manage the accounts, right?
Could it be that I really wronged you? Are you really not the killer? I'm not so sure now. Since you're so adamant, maybe you're not the killer after all.
I'm sorry, Uncle Fang. I shouldn't have doubted your loyalty to Mr. Shi Mo. The killer must be someone else.
Do you think that by pressuring me, I won't find other evidence to prove you're the killer? You're right, I have a weak psychological resilience. I'm quitting this case.

question: #question# What should Ke Bai say to show he has managed to handle the pressure from Uncle Fang?

content.content: Now that you mention it, indeed, his motive for murder doesn't seem adequate. I trust your judgment, and it looks like the killer might be someone else entirely, even someone who seems completely unlikely.

(Indifferent tone) Hmm, really? I know you have your judgment, but isn't this just a hypothesis? It's not very likely, but if you think it's necessary, continue your investigation. For now, I still lean towards my previous thoughts. Your words aren't very convincing; the evidence is right here. What more do you need to argue?
I'm sorry, Uncle Fang. I shouldn't have doubted your character. I understand that you've been very loyal to Mr. Shi's family all this time.

(With a relaxed and teasing tone) Haha, Uncle Fang, don't take it to heart. Actually, I was just testing your reaction with those words. It's a little technique I've developed over years as a detective. Sometimes you have to use such methods to truly see the truth. Rest assured, I am in control, but this way is more fun and effective. Haha, Uncle Fang, I was indeed testing you. This technique of deduction is one I've honed over many years as a detective, please understand.

question: #question# How would Ke Bai likely respond to Uncle Fang's statements, given his trust in him?

dialog.content: So what if that’s the case?

You who have never seen so much wealth slowly developed malicious intent. Mr. Shi never expected to nurture a menace. You feared that one day, when the fraudulent accounts were exposed, Mr. Shi would certainly not spare you. So, you decided to strike first and eliminate his whole family before they could discover the truth. This way, you could enjoy the fortune alone. Am I right?

I respect you as a guest brought in by Mr. Shi, so I won’t argue with you. But everything you're claiming is pure alarmism. The account books are right there, feel free to check if I’ve tampered with them.
How could this be... Could I have deduced incorrectly? That’s impossible...

Everyone, disperse, please. Uncle Fang, don’t blame Ke Bai, he didn’t mean it. He’s just been under a lot of work pressure lately and isn’t thinking straight. Don’t take it to heart. Let’s wait until the police arrive to say more.
Alright, I won’t hold it against him. I’ll go tend to Mr. Shi now. You all should return to your rooms and rest, and make sure to secure the doors and windows.

After Cherry and Ke Bai returned to their room, they carefully reviewed everything that happened during the banquet and everyone present, but they couldn't come up with any strong evidence to identify the culprit. The next morning, when daylight broke, the police arrived at Snowy Mountain Villa and took everyone back to the police station. After thoroughly inspecting the entire villa, the police found no traces of the perpetrator.
So who could the murderer be? Why are you looking at me like that? Don't tell me you're suspecting me too?
You've been acting very strange today. No matter how much I tried to persuade you, you refused to leave the villa. This must mean you have unfinished business here.
You've always despised the rich, yet you insisted on attending this banquet. If it's not part of a plan, what else could it be?

What plan could I possibly have? I've just been toughened by life's punches and can't afford to see things from such a narrow perspective anymore. I came here mainly to network for my new book launch. What, am I so worthless in your eyes?
I'm just stating the facts and reasoning things out. There's no need to blow this out of proportion.

With your suspicious nature, you've driven away so many friends. Haven't you realized that yet? You think since you're a private detective, you can just use your wit without evidence and accuse others randomly. I really overestimated you when I thought of being your friend. I see you're obsessed with solving cases. Aren't you afraid someone will sue you for defamation?
You're reacting so strongly, it seems like you're really hiding something.
I'm the one with the problem? The biggest problem is you, being so ungrateful. We'll see what happens once the police arrive. (slams the door and leaves)

The relationship between Ke Bai and Cherry was completely severed, and Ke Bai lost his last remaining friend. Early the next morning, the police arrived at the Snowy Villa, interviewed everyone, and investigated the scene, but found no clues about the murderer. The Snowy Villa murder case thus became a mystery, with rumors spreading that malevolent spirits haunt the villa, warning people to stay away.
What? How did you figure that out?
There's no way one person could sneak in and carry out this string of murders without a trace in front of so many people.
So you're saying... there's a traitor inside Fengxue Manor who’s collaborating with the killer among the guests to murder them?
Exactly, but I can't determine who it is just yet...
So what should we do next?

content.content: I need you to work with me, let's find out who the killer is together.
Just stick close behind me, I'll protect you.
I already have some clues on this case. What about you, Yingtao? Why don't we have a contest to see who can guess the killer first?
Just be my assistant. No need to worry about solving the case; you can even share the credit. It's perfect!

question: #question# How should Ke Bai express his desire to work with Yingtao to find the killer?

content.content: I've been investigating cases for many years, and I'm confident in my detective skills. The killers should be the magician Sun Qian and Shi Mo's twin brother, Shi Heng.
I don't know who the killer is, and frankly, I don't care anymore. Whatever happens, happens.
I'm overwhelmed and haven't handled my own cases well. I should probably just focus on my own stuff.
I've never had much confidence in my detective skills; it's usually just luck. This time, why don't we just flip a coin to decide who the killer is? It's easy and fair.

question: #question# How should Ke Bai convey full confidence in his detective skills?

dialog.content: Alright, as long as you need me, I will fully cooperate with you!
After discussing with Ying Tao, we both agree that you, Uncle Fang, and Sun Qian, conspired together to murder Mr. Shi's family and steal their property!
I would never get involved in murdering the gentleman and the lady, let alone the young master whom I've watched grow up. I've always been loyal; how could I harm them?
Exactly, stop spitting lies. I never even knew Uncle Fang beforehand, so how could we conspire to murder anyone? Where's your evidence? Baseless accusations are slander!

I fear it was you who tempted Uncle Fang with money. You two colluded to poison Mrs. Shi with pesticides. Why only Mrs. Shi? Because when Uncle Fang first attempted the murder, he was so nervous that he woke Mr. Shi. That’s why both of them weren't poisoned together. After the failed attempt, Sun Qian seized the opportunity when Mr. Shi went upstairs to calm the young master and attempted another attack.
What you’re saying is completely nonsensical. I’m innocent, and I'll wait for the police to clear my name.
Indeed, baseless accusations. You can't even solve your cases and yet meddle in others' family affairs. Everyone should wait for the police to decide and not listen to him.
Everyone, please remain calm, the police will arrive soon, and it has stopped snowing outside.
(After police questioning, it was confirmed Uncle Fang and Sun Qian both had alibis) How could this be? How could my deduction fail? Am I such a failure as a private detective?
Don't be too hard on yourself, you did nothing wrong and had good intentions. It was just a mistake due to the tight time constraints.
No... I am just a failure...
After Ke Bai's deductive failure, he lost confidence in himself and never recovered since. The murder case at Blizzard Villa went unresolved due to lack of evidence and eventually was left unsolved.
How can this be? Wasn't Shimo's brother already dead?
I'm afraid the Mr. Shimo we see now is actually Shi Heng in disguise. Let's confront him.
(Finding Shi Heng) Mr. Shi, why were you and your wife in the same room when she was poisoned, yet nothing happened to you?

profile.name: Shi Heng
profile.public profile: The eldest son of the oil tycoon, Shimo's brother. Tragically fell off a cliff during childhood.
profile.private profile: In reality, Shi Heng didn't die; he landed on a bent-neck tree and survived. After the fall, he lost his memory and eventually ended up working for a magician. Upon learning of the oil tycoon's death, he recalled being pushed off the cliff by his brother and decided to seek revenge.
profile.goal: Wants his brother to pay with his life for what happened years ago.

dialog.content: How should I know? You're the detective, you should be asking yourself.

I guess you made some sort of deal with the magician. First, you hid in the magician's prop box. Then the magician drove you to the Snowy Mountain Villa. To everyone else, it appeared that only the magician entered the villa. Once there, you stayed hidden in the prop box until the magician let you out during a performance. At that moment, the dog was brought inside the house by the butler, so it didn’t notice you. Afterwards, you used the butler's ladder to climb into the attic and stayed hidden, sneaking into Shimo's room at midnight and poisoning the couple. You then threw Shimo's body off the cliff, dressed in Mr. Shi's clothes, and posed as him! Then you acted clueless and returned to the villa.
What evidence do you have that I'm an imposter? I clearly saw the culprit escape through the window!

content.content: Though it sounds far-fetched, I am very sure my deduction is correct. Stop trying to confuse things. I can directly point you out because I have found irrefutable evidence. That half-bottle of pesticide that disappeared from Uncle Fang's room is solid proof!

Roundy has been barking at you! This is the most solid evidence! Uncle Fang mentioned when he arrived at the villa that this dog only barks at strangers. It didn't bark during the banquet, but now it won't stop. This clearly shows an uninvited guest is in the villa. If you've been taking care of Roundy and are its owner, why is it constantly barking at you? If you were really Mr. Shimo, holding Roundy should be easy for you, right?

That half-bottle of pesticide from Uncle Fang's room! It's evidence of your crime against Mrs. Shi! How do you explain it? I noticed half the pesticide was missing, and only you and Uncle Fang had access to it. Uncle Fang's suspicion has been cleared. Confess now; continued denial will only make things worse!

Earlier, I found some footprints while searching for evidence outside. They clearly belong to you! They left distinct marks in the soil near the scene and perfectly match the shoes you typically wear. How do you explain this? These pieces of evidence all clearly point to you. Continuing to cover it up will only make the truth clearer!

Are you pretending? Was my previous deduction all wrong? That's impossible. I must have overlooked some crucial clues. Now the situation has become more complicated. I need to review all the evidence and clues to find the real truth. Otherwise, all efforts will be in vain!

dialog.content: But... there wasn't any pesticide missing from my room.
What? Didn't you say half a bottle was missing?
I just remembered that the gardener used it for weeding a couple of days ago. Nothing's actually missing.
Darn it! The culprit got away!
Let's hurry and chase after them!
No, don't bother. We can't catch them. They were well-prepared for this.

The next day, the police brought everyone back to the station. Due to insufficient evidence, they didn't believe the theory that Shi Mo's brother came back to life to kill his brother's whole family. Thus, the culprit of the Fengxue Villa murder case remains at large.
Isn't this easy? How could my dog not recognize me? (Steps forward to try, Yuan Zai barks incessantly) What's wrong with you, dog? You must be crazy!
This isn't Mr. Shi Mo. Mr. Shi Mo would never hit or scold Yuan Zai, he always takes great care of him.

Hahaha! I am indeed not Shi Mo, I am his elder brother, Shi Heng. Back then, I didn’t accidentally fall off the cliff; my brother pushed me off! Luckily, fate spared me, and I landed on a crooked tree that saved my life. But I lost my memory in the fall. After many twists and turns, I ended up working for a magician. It wasn't until after my father passed away that I remembered what happened at that time, so I decided to get revenge. I decided to ally with the magician to assassinate the rich man, reclaim the estate that rightfully belongs to me, and split the fortune with the magician afterward. Everything else went just as you deduced.
You've finally confessed, but you shouldn't have killed their family. You should have used legal means to reclaim what was yours.

The next day, after the police arrived at the scene, they took Shi Heng away. For the murder of three people, he will spend the rest of his life in prison. The magician, as an accomplice, was also sentenced to fifteen years. Ke Bai became a moderately famous detective locally, and his business boomed.
